title: Canada retail e-commerce sales growth 2018 to 2023
summary: This statistic shows the predicted year on year change in household consumption in the United Kingdom ( uk ) from 2018 to 2023 . The forecast predicts a steady and slight increase throughout the entire period , by 0.1 percent . The only decrease is expected to happen between 2018 and 2019 , by a decline of 0.1 percentage of change .
gold: This statistic gives information on retail e-commerce sales growth in Canada from 2018 to 2023 . In 2018 , retail e-commerce sales grew by 9.1 percent compared to the previous year . In 2022 , retail e-commerce sales are expected to grow 4.7 percent from the previous year .
